# The `Value` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A SandboxIR <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> has users. This is the base class. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A SandboxIR <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> has users. This is the base class.

Definition at line 63 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/value-h">Value.h</a>.

### getUid() {#aab622b4257690e722b1c7a988b2c800d}

### hasNUsesOrMore() {#a8d160c299df51820d73ff0f393334f8e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::sandboxir::Value::hasNUsesOrMore (unsigned Num) const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return true if this value has N uses or more.

This is logically equivalent to <a href="#a395a45c11744d878a19d9db6315bc026">getNumUses()</a> &gt;= N. WARNING: This can be expensive, as it is linear to the number of users.

### Val {#a0c4530f3c64d8c2eafac20fb87105d8a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::Value&#42; llvm::sandboxir::Value::Val = nullptr</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
The LLVM <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> that corresponds to this SandboxIR <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a>.

NOTE: Some sandboxir Instructions, like Packs, may include more than one value and in these cases <code>Val</code> points to the last instruction in program order.
